entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
